meanings.definition: One of four children born at the same time to the same mother.
meanings.sent1: The hospital celebrated the birth of a quadruplet, a baby born with three siblings at the same time.
meanings.sent2: The quadruplet siblings always had each other's backs growing up.
meanings.sent3: The quadruplet babies caused quite a stir in the maternity ward, surprising everyone with their arrival.
meanings.sent4: The quadruplet of siblings formed an unbreakable bond that lasted a lifetime.
meanings.sent5: The quadruplet's arrival brought joy and chaos to the family, but they were loved immensely.

meanings.definition: A group or set of four similar things.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a discount on a quadruplet of books, perfect for book lovers.
meanings.sent2: The quadruplet of trees in the park provided a beautiful sight in all seasons.
meanings.sent3: The quadruplet of cupcakes disappeared quickly at the party, showing how popular they were.
meanings.sent4: The quadruplet of seasons brought changes in weather and nature throughout the year.
meanings.sent5: The quadruplet of puppies wagged their tails in unison, a delightful sight for onlookers.

meanings.definition: A combination of four notes played together in music.
meanings.sent1: The musician played a lovely quadruplet of notes on the piano, creating a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent2: The quadruplet of musical notes added depth and richness to the song.
meanings.sent3: The quadruplet of notes danced in the air, enchanting the audience with their melody.
meanings.sent4: The quadruplet of musical tones resonated in perfect harmony, captivating all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The quadruplet of notes lingered in the room, leaving a peaceful atmosphere behind.
